name: Stanley H. WHITE, III, et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF EAST PROVIDENCE et al.
name_abbreviation: White v. Zoning Board of Review

parties: Stanley H. WHITE, III, et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF EAST PROVIDENCE et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is granted.
DORIS, J., did not participate.

attorneys: Carty & Carty, Joseph B. Carty, Jr., Providence, for petitioner.
Robert R. Nocera, Asst. Sol., East Providence, for respondents.
casebody.head_matter:
Stanley H. WHITE, III, et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF EAST PROVIDENCE et al.
No. 79-350-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Nov. 29, 1979.
Carty & Carty, Joseph B. Carty, Jr., Providence, for petitioner.
Robert R. Nocera, Asst. Sol., East Providence, for respondents.
